item.title: What's New in December 2023
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: [Before you dive in] Dwarves is operated as a 50% company, 50% community. Everything we learn along the way of work, we transform into knowledge and distribute back to our tech community. If you want to get in touch, visit Dwarves Network In December, we launched our Consulting Team, released our finding on tech trends, and last but not least, got everyone ready to wrap up 2023. Reporting tech signals - We stay ahead by monitoring high-potential trends in tech.

item.title: How R&D contributes to Performance Review
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Our organization values the research and development (R&D) efforts of our team members and aims to incorporate these contributions into performance reviews. It’s important that individual R&D activities not only pursue personal growth but also align with our team and organizational objectives. Key Assessment Factors For R&D activities, there are a few factors will contribute to your performance: Alignment with Team Objectives: Your research should be aligned with topics identified as crucial for the future growth and success of our team.
